summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue Northwest, from Market Street to West Sixty-fifth Street, by regrading and curbing the same, and by the construction of concrete sidewalks, with wooden crosswalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 782 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
